Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Cermak-Chinatown
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Cermak-Chinatown due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Cermak-Chinatown due to a sick customer.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Southbound #82 Kimball-Homan Reroute near 31st/Lawndale
ShortDescription: Southbound 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted near 31st/Lawndale.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via 31st, Millard, 32nd, Central Park, 31st, and resume normal route due to, street blockage near 31st/Lawndale.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Westbound #51 51st Reroute near 51st/Union
ShortDescription: Westbound #51 51st buses are temporarily rerouted near 51st/Union.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #51 51st buses are temporarily rerouted via 51st, Halsted, 51st, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near 51st/Union.

Eastbound  buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near 47th/Cornelia
ShortDescription: Northbound 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Cottage Grove, 39th and Lake Shore Drive, due to street blockage near 47th/Cornelia.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Cottage Grove, 39th and Lake Shore Drive, due to street blockage near 47th/Cornelia.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #152 Addison Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: #152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted, then resume their normal route on Addison, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: #22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont,  due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, then resume their normal route on Clark, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green and Orange Line Service Delayed at Roosevelt
ShortDescription: Green and Orange Line trains are standing in both directions near Roosevelt due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green and Orange Line trains are standing in both directions near Roosevelt due to signal problems. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
